objectives.desc: Locate the source of the humming beneath the Strip.
Extract the code fragment still running inside the ruined robot.
Bring the data to Kara Mullins at the Strip.
Speak with the Vault 77 survivor who knows the truth.

outcomes.atomic_fizz: Kara gains access to the fragment.
outcomes.vault77: Jonas warns you of what the code really means.
outcomes.house: House flags you as a variable.
